AI Description: PRUN (Parallel R Utils) is a set of R packages that provide parallel computing tools to support high-performance and distributed computing in R environment. It allows users to parallelize their R code to significantly speed up data analysis and computation tasks.
Core Features: Parallel Computing Support In R, High-Performance Computing Capabilities, Distributed Computing Functionality, Efficient Data Analysis & Computation, Integration With Existing R Workflows
General Tags: Parallel Computing, High-Performance Computing, Distributed Computing, Data Analysis, Computation
